price: 28. Kuma aanu soo dejin qolodiisii  gadaashi wax ciidan ah aan kaga keennay samada, mana aanu falno sidaas.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā anzalnā ʿalā qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina al-samāi wamā kunnā munzilīna
